titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that United States leadership in 5G wireless technology is a national priority.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that United States leadership in 5G wireless technology is a national priority.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the Senate's position that world leadership in the implementation of 5G wireless technology is a national priority.
